metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12970 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: XSS was discovered in SquirrelMail through 1.4.22 and 1.5.x through 1.5.2.Due to improper handling of RCDATA and RAWTEXT type elements, the built-insanitization mechanism can be bypassed. Malicious script content from HTMLe-mail can be executed within the application context via crafted use of(for example) a NOEMBED, NOFRAMES, NOSCRIPT, or TEXTAREA element.

criterions.comment: squirrelmail: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
